title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is not being persisted between sessions of the workbench.
OB:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
SR: The MRU file list should still contain the previously opened files after the workbench is restarted.
